markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Path of Iron](/Feats.aspx?ID=2021) <actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 182 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=67)

**Frequency**
once per minute

**Prerequisites**
[Martial Artist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2018)

</column>

---

With a burst of effort, you weave a path through your enemies, striking each in turn as you move past them. You Stride; this movement doesn't trigger reactions. You can Strike up to three times at any point during your movement, each against a different enemy. Each attack counts toward your multiple attack penalty, but your multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until you have made all your attacks.
name: Path of Iron
